statements: DELETE FROM transaction_trends WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM transaction_trends WHERE qr_code_scanned = true AND transaction_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_amount > 500 AND payment_method = 'Credit'
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount < 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vendor_data WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE user_id = 10 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM payment_method WHERE payment_method_type = 'Credit Card';
